EmailTemplate.name: ASI CRM VN POSM Request Notify HR Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: POSM Request {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name} submitted by {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.OwnerFullName} has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.ASI_GiftBox_HR_User__c},
A new POSM Request {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name} submitted by {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.OwnerFullName} has been approved.
Please click this link {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Link} to review the POSM Request details.
